description: [Revenge RAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0379) uses the [Forfiles](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0193) utility to execute commands on the system.(Citation: Cofense RevengeRAT Feb 2019)

external_references.description: Gannon, M. (2019, February 11). With Upgrades in Delivery and Support Infrastructure, Revenge RAT Malware is a Bigger Threat. Retrieved May 1, 2019.
